description: This file defines a Python class 'PlaygroundSettings' using Pydantic for managing environment-based configuration settings for the Playground API, including environment validation and CORS origin list setup.

classes.name: PlaygroundSettings
classes.description: A Pydantic-based configuration class for Playground API settings, supporting environment validation and CORS configuration.

methods.name: validate_playground_env
methods.description: Validator method to ensure the 'env' attribute is one of the allowed runtime environments ('dev', 'stg', 'prd').

methods.name: set_cors_origin_list
methods.description: Validator method to set and extend the CORS origin list with default allowed domains.
